pageContext.claim: “I know he was on his plane 27 times and he said he was on the plane 4 times. But when they checked the plane logs, Bill Clinton -- who was a very good friend of Epstein -- he was on the plane about 27 or 28 times. So why did he say "four times"? And then the question you have to ask is: Did Bill Clinton go to the island?”
pageContext.analysis: This is a reference to a public statement Clinton offered after Epstein’s most recent arrest, but Trump inflates numbers. Clinton claimed to have flown on Epstein’s plane for four trips, not four times. The Washington Examiner determined that Clinton took six trips with Epstein, for a total of 27 flights.
